platform.summary: Prediction of the unobserved character states in a community of organisms from phylogenetic information.
comments: PICRUSt is a bioinformatics software package designed to predict metagenome functional content from marker gene (e.g., 16S rRNA) surveys and full genomes.
quotas: Anonymous access and account creation are both supported.
citations: [Predictive functional profiling of microbial communities using 16S rRNA marker gene sequences](https://www.nature.com/articles/nbt.2676), Morgan G I Langille, Jesse Zaneveld, J Gregory Caporaso, Daniel McDonald, Dan Knights, Joshua A Reyes, Jose C Clemente, Deron E Burkepile, Rebecca L Vega Thurber, Rob Knight, Robert G Beiko & Curtis Huttenhower. *Nature Biotechnology* 31, 814â€“821 (2013)
